title: Lesson 07 - One Minute Russian
description:
In lesson 7 of One Minute Russian you will learn to say that it's nice to meet someone. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Russian on our website at http://www.oneminutelanguages.com. 

One Minute Russian is brought to you by the Radio Lingua Network and is ©Copyright 2008.
